explanation: [0-0] A person wearing black pants is stirring a large can of Milo with a spoon.

[0-4] The camera zooms out, revealing a young woman sitting on a grey sofa, drinking from a large can of Milo with a straw. To the right of the Milo are two bananas. She takes a sip, closes her eyes, and appears to enjoy it immensely. A man wearing a tracksuit, black shorts, and glasses enters from a doorway on the right. The camera focuses on the man as he licks his lips, drooling heavily.
